snippet: The three men were arrested upon their return to Germany after receiving training and then fighting alongside militants from the group known as the Shabab.
abstract: German authorities say they arrested three Germans at Frankfurt Airport who are suspected of training and fighting with Somali Islamist group known as the Shabab.
lead_paragraph: The three men were arrested upon their return to Germany after receiving training and then fighting alongside militants from the group known as the Shabab.

headline.main: Germany Arrests 3 on Charges of Joining Somali Militants
headline.print_headline: Germany: 3 Detained Over Ties to Somali Militants
